title: (x) ITC American Typewriter example?
content: Does anyone know of an advertisment or company that uses American Typewriter? I'm supposed to find one for a school prodject but I've come up completely blank!!! If anyone could help, that'd be swell...
author: shyguy1

comments.content:
Hi Mikey ...   
How about Office Max?   
Seems like a bolder verson of AT Bold...   
   
 [http://www.officemax.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221850/http:/www.officemax.com/)   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-american-typewriter/bold/testdrive.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-american-typewriter/bold/testdrive.html)
Milton Glaser's "I love NY" would be the no-brainer answer...

\*slaps head\* I drive by an Office Max everyday and it never crossed my mind. I think becasue I look at the sign so often I tend to ignore it. And I havn't seen many "I \<3 NY" shirts here in Texas, but thanks for the tip!! \*runs of to google\*
